title: 真正的粉丝，就算不是程序员，也能看懂这行代码
contents:
运行环境: Python 2.7

l=(lambda t:(lambda: _).func_code.co_lnotab.join([unichr(int(i,0x10)) for i in eval(t.decode(True.__class__.__name__[0]+().__iter__().__class__.__name__[-4]+{1}.__class__.__name__[:2]+str(0x40)))]))("WycweDVmODgnLCAnMHg2MGVkJywgJzB4NjEyNycsICcweGZmMGMnLCAnMHg1YzMxJywgJzB4NTA1YScsICcweDRlODYnLCAnMHg0ZTAwJywgJzB4NzBiOScsICcweDVmYWUnLCAnMHg1YzBmJywgJzB4NzY4NCcsICcweDVkZTUnLCAnMHg0ZjVjJywgJzB4ZmYwYycsICcweDhjMjInLCAnMHg4YzIyJywgJzB4NTkyNycsICcweDViYjYnLCAnMHgyMCdd");exec (1,2).__class__.__name__[2]+(lambda: _).func_code.co_lnotab.__class__.__name__[-1]+type(1).__name__+chr(0x20)+unichr.__name__[0]+str(type(type))[-2]+l+str(True.__class__).__getitem__(-2)
